input.sentences: my friend is all ready to get married !
her beautiful sister the maid of honor .
me and my date waiting for the wedding to begin .
the beautiful cake | i almost thought it was just a big bouquet of flowers !
the wedding is over just eating and dancing now !
output.sentences: An Indian bride stands in a parking lot wearing a beautiful red dress.
Another Indian woman stand on a hardwood floor in front of a stage.
Many people attend the wedding and are talking and having a great time.
there are beautiful flower arrangements set upon the tables.
There are a few tables that appear to be empty.
